name: v1.17.7
body:
#330 - Upgrade semantic metrics to 1.1.7

Note: This is a breaking change if you were querying for sprawling keys (ex: `apollo.apollo.apollo.apollo`). You may have to update your queries to use the non-sprawling key. If you are not using a key in your query, the results should stay the same.

name: v1.8.0
body:
* Add jdk11 build to CircleCI configuration #261 
   * Added the following dependencies  `jaxb-api`, `jaxb-core` and `javax.activation-api`
* Build with jdk10 and fix compilation errors #241 
   * Bump `auto-matter` `0.11.0` -> `0.15.0`
   * Bump `guice` `4.0` -> `4.2.0`
   * Bump `guice-multibindings ` `4.0` -> `4.2.0`
   * Bump `guava` `18.0` -> `23.6-jre`
   * Bump `findbugs ` `3.0.0` -> `3.0.2`
   * Bump `auto-service ` `1.0-rc2` -> `1.0-rc4 `
   * Bump `auto-value ` `1.1` -> `1.5.4`
* Add ability to decorate metrics with tags from environment variables. #252

* Add status code for rate limiting #228

* Add config option for following redirects for the okhttpclient #219

name: v1.5.0
body:
- This version removes the `application-version` from Metrics
  - Upgrades logback and slf4j versions

name: v1.4.0
body: This version makes case insensitive lookups of headers but preserves the original letter case when iterating through them: https://github.com/spotify/apollo/pull/199
Minor patch to `FakeOngoingRequest` to simplify testing: #183.

Three patches:
1. avoid double-logging of invalid URIs (#175, backported)
2. upgrade to typesafe config 1.3.1 (#177)
3. simplify safely implementing `RequestContext` (#180)

The main feature in this release is the addition of request metadata to the `RequestContext`, allowing you to understand the remote IP address an incoming request originated from, etc. See #169 for details.

Also includes the addition of 'componentId' to the service metadata, see #171.

name: v1.2.5
body:
A couple of bug fixes:
- In the area of handling Jetty timeouts and error logging, #157, #159 and #161 
- And a fix that enables resolution of things provided by `MetricsModule` when running tests with `ServiceHelper`, #163

name: v1.2.4
body:
Patch improving Jetty error handling via #152 

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.2.3...v1.2.4)

name: v1.2.3
body:
Main features:
- Support for access logging via #149 
- Populate the 'service' field of Request via #145 

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3)

name: v1.2.2
body:
Backported patches from master

- #137 Close down okhttp dispatcher executor

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2)

name: v1.2.1

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1)

name: v1.2.0
body:
Highlights:
- Adds the apollo-metrics module to HttpService integrating [semantic-metrics](https://github.com/spotify/semantic-metrics) library with the Apollo request/response handling facilities

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0)

name: v1.1.0
body:
Highlights:
- apollo-entity/better support for serialization and deserialization of payloads: #89
- support for configuring http clients: #94  
- bug fixes:
  - #101 - better response code for undecodable path parameters 
  - #105 - avoid serializing empty payloads to null in apollo-extra serializers

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.0.4...v1.1.0)

Some documentation updates and #87, which should improve performance for services with large numbers of relatively long-lived requests.

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4)

name: v1.0.3
body:
Minor patch
- #79 Arrival time patch for `RequestContext`

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3)

name: v1.0.2
body:
Some small improvements, mainly:
- Deployment instructions, code of conduct link #74, #75
- Fall back to domain if apollo.{backend,domain} are unset #76
- Setting for disabling outgoing request logging #77

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2)

name: v1.0.1
body:
Some small improvements, mainly:
- Support for map/flatmap on endpoint handlers: #52 
- Various improvements to the Request interface: #56 
- Support for setting TTL per Request: #65 
- Allow overriding config files explicitly: #66 

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1)

name: v1.0.0
body:
1.0.0 release of Apollo!

Java libraries for writing composable microservices

[http://spotify.github.io/apollo/]

[commits](https://github.com/spotify/apollo/commits/v1.0.0)
